name: Smooth Facebook 2017
description: A simple smooth Facebook style with a dynamically changing background image. The background images that are randomly selected are here Please note the background images are not made by me all rights reserved to appropriate parties.
additional_info:
1.11.1
  • Added transparency to help flyout
1.11.0
  • Added transparency to notification, message, and friend request flouts
1.10.0
  • Fixed layout so it is view-able again (Will fix right and left column background soon)
  • Changed Name to reflect new year
1.9.2
  • Fixed Bluebar...
1.9.1
  • Facebook keeps changing their code and I keep fixing it, Fixed Bluebar yet again!
1.9
  • Fixed Bluebar again
  • removed some un-needed code
  • Added new screenshot
In future releases I plan to fix right column Updated Name to reflect new year 1.8
  • Fixed bluebar due to Facebook changes
1.7
  • Changed Left column width
  • Changed Center column width
Updated name 1.6
  • Made main content (center column) not transparent for posts except for when you mouse over them
  • Left column got the semi-transparent treatment for the background
1.5
  • Changed main column width
  • Changed main column position
  • Changed right column content (still buggy)
Major Update! 1.4
  • Almost a complete re-write
  • Cleaned up CSS
  • Re-added right column (is buggy)
  • Changed much of the page metrics
  • Apps page content now not semi-transparent
Known bugs
  • API on webpages shows background image
  • Profile page: Right column behind main content
  • When Sidebar is shown it screws up the layout
1.3
  • Fixed recent update to bluebar
1.2
  • Added Custom thin scrollbars
  • Added more background images to server
1.1.2
  • Moved files to a faster server
1.1.1
  • Removed right column (Will re enable it later)
1.1
  • Removed "Find Friends" link in Nav bar
  • Changed Left col Hover color
  • Changed jewel color
  • Changed Main content color
  • Custom cursor Thanks to JamesGriffing
1.0
  • Initial Public version
